text: Hauterive is a municipality of the district of Saane in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2001, when the municipalities of Ecuvillens and Posieux joined together to become Hauterive.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 The abbey of Hauterive was founded in 1138. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Hauterive Abbey website Category:Municipalities in Sarine
title: Hauterive, Fribourg
